description:
Large transport trucks capable of operating in nearly any environment, the DL-88 Centipede is the standard heavy cargo vehicle of the U.N. Forces. The DL-88 is equipped for low-gravity/low-atmosphere operation and can carry large loads quickly on it`s ten-wheel drive system.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/dl88-centipede.htm
name: DL-88 Centipede
